Description: Coca-Cola Bottling Company Consolidated agreed to pay $495,000 in back wages and interest to 95 African-American and Hispanic job seekers who applied in 2002 for sales support positions at the company's Black Satchel Road distribution facility in Charlotte. The settlement followed an investigation by the Office of Federal Contract Compliance Programs.
Agency: Office of Federal Contract Compliance Programs

Description: back pay award in unfair labor practices case
